summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Camp Baraisa management system. All requested features are working correctly: Admin login with credentials admin@campbaraisa.com/testpassword123, Dashboard loads after login, Kanban page shows enhanced camper cards with bigger tiles and contact buttons, Data Center page has Campers/Parents tabs with export options, Settings page has Templates tab with email/SMS template management, Parent Portal shows correct footer contact info (848.BAR.AISA, office@campbaraisa.com, 665 Princeton Ave), Camper list rows are clickable and navigate to details, Login page shows contact info for non-admins, and all 9 sidebar navigation items are present.
passed_tests: Admin login works with credentials admin@campbaraisa.com / testpassword123
Dashboard page loads after login with stats (2 campers, $5,000 invoiced, $1,000 collected, $4,000 outstanding)
Kanban page shows camper cards with enhanced tiles (bigger cards, photo placeholder, grade/yeshiva info, parent contact info, Call/SMS/Email buttons)
Data Center page loads with Campers/Parents tabs and Export dropdown (CSV/PDF options)
Settings page has Templates tab with email/SMS template management (All/Email/SMS filters, Add Template button)
Parent Portal loads with correct footer showing contact info (848.BAR.AISA, office@campbaraisa.com, 665 Princeton Ave Apt. 206)
Camper list rows are clickable (cursor-pointer class) and navigate to camper details page
Login page shows contact info for non-admins in footer section
Navigation sidebar shows all 9 correct items: Overview, Campers, Billing, Kanban, Communications, Rooms & Groups, Financial, Data Center, Settings
seed_data_creation: None - used existing test data (2 Test Campers, Test Parent)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All frontend features are working correctly. The app has 2 test campers in 'Accepted' status, 2 test parents, and proper billing data. Kanban board has 10 status columns with drag-and-drop functionality. Settings Templates tab has one 'Acceptance email' template. Parent Portal is accessible via token URL and shows payment history.
